title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 79.6 - Inspection sticker fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 79.6 - Inspection sticker fees

State Regulations
(a) The fee for a certificate representing
that a vehicle has passed a safety inspection is $2. (b) [Reserved]
(c) Except as modified in subdivision (e) of
this section, the fee for a certificate representing that a vehicle has passed
a combined safety and emissions inspection is $6. (d) [Reserved]
(e) The fee for a certificate representing
that a vehicle has passed a combined safety and diesel emissions inspection is
$2. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
79.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
